# Autoquill AI - AI Receptionist for Small Business

> Autoquill AI provides AI-powered phone answering and virtual receptionist services for small businesses. Our AI voice agents answer calls 24/7, book appointments, qualify leads, and handle customer inquiriesâ€”all for a fraction of the cost of a human receptionist.

## What We Do

Autoquill AI replaces or supplements your front desk with an AI receptionist that:
- Answers every call instantly, 24/7/365
- Books appointments directly into your calendar (Calendly, Google Calendar, practice management software)
- Qualifies leads and captures contact information
- Answers FAQs about your business, pricing, and services
- Transfers urgent calls to your team
- Sends SMS confirmations and follow-ups
- Integrates with your CRM (HubSpot, Salesforce, etc.)

## Who We Serve

Our AI receptionist is designed for service-based businesses including:
- **Dental Practices**: Patient scheduling, insurance questions, new patient intake
- **HVAC Companies**: Emergency dispatch, service scheduling, quote requests
- **Plumbers**: After-hours call handling, emergency routing, appointment booking
- **Med Spas**: Treatment consultations, appointment scheduling, pricing inquiries
- **Law Firms**: Client intake, consultation scheduling, case inquiry handling
- **Real Estate Agents**: Lead qualification, showing scheduling, property inquiries
- **Veterinary Clinics**: Appointment booking, emergency triage, medication refills
- **Auto Repair Shops**: Service scheduling, estimate requests, parts inquiries

## Pricing

- **Starter**: $199/month - 100 minutes included, best for low-volume businesses
- **Growth**: $399/month - 300 minutes included, most popular for growing businesses  
- **Scale**: $799/month - 800 minutes included, best for high-volume operations

All plans include: Custom voice training, calendar integration, CRM sync, SMS notifications, call transcripts, and 24/7 availability.

## Key Benefits

1. **Never miss a call**: AI answers instantly, even at 2am
2. **90% cost savings**: $199/month vs $40,000+/year for human receptionist
3. **Natural conversations**: Advanced voice AI that sounds human, not robotic
4. **Instant setup**: Go live in 48 hours or less
5. **No contracts**: Cancel anytime, month-to-month billing

## How It Works

1. **Quick Setup (24 hours)**: Share your business info, FAQs, and scheduling preferences
2. **AI Training (24-48 hours)**: We train your custom AI agent on your business
3. **Go Live (Instant)**: Forward your calls and start capturing every lead

## Technology

Our AI uses advanced natural language processing with:
- Sub-500ms response times
- Natural voice synthesis with emotion and inflection
- Real-time calendar availability checking
- Intelligent call routing and escalation
- Multi-language support

## Company

Autoquill AI is a US-based company serving businesses across North America. Founded to solve the #1 problem small businesses face: missed calls that become missed revenue.
